Toto Wolff storms around COTA: Watch Mercedes boss drive around the track
03 Nov 2019, 16:20 by Matt Gretton

Toto Wolff is usually on the over side of the pit wall, but on this occasion, the Mercedes team boss finds himself in the car. He has a go at COTA ahead of the United States Grand Prix weekend.
